rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed to welcome guests and provide ample space for storage.

The main living area with colonial architectural elements, offering a comfortable space for relaxation and social gatherings. Features large windows on the east and south walls in accordance with Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room for convenient dining arrangements. Features a built-in breakfast nook following colonial style aesthetics.
Modern kitchen with colonial finishes. Designed to have an open view of the dining area while aligning with Vastu guidelines for functionality and safety.
A comfortable master bedroom offering a colonial ambiance. Windows are positioned on the south to promote positive energy according to Vastu.
Secondary bedroom designed for guests with sufficient natural light and ventilation.
Modern bathroom integrated into the guest area while adhering to privacy and Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated space for entertainment with soundproof walls. Placed in the west section of the apartment to align with Vastu principles and provide a quiet ambiance.

openings.description: Principal entrance door located on the south facade for positive energy as per Vastu.
Multiple windows placed strategically to maximize natural light and ventilation across the apartment.
A balcony adjoining the living room for extra space and fresh air; designed with colonial elements.

vastu_considerations.kitchen_location: Adjacent to dining area, avoiding direct alignment with the entrance
